name: ghost-heroku-github
description: Easily deploy Ghost on Heroku, with GitHub for storage

GHOST_GITHUB_BASE_URL.description: Base URL of newly saved images. Uses `raw.githubusercontent.com` by default.

GHOST_GITHUB_BRANCH.description: Branch to push assets to. Defaults to `master`.

GHOST_GITHUB_DESTINATION.description: Directory to push assets to. Defaults to `/`.

GHOST_GITHUB_OWNER.description: Username of the user/organization the repository is under.

GHOST_GITHUB_TOKEN.description: An access token from the account commits will be authored by.

GHOST_GITHUB_USE_RELATIVE_URLS.description: Whether or not to return relative URLs instead of absolute URLs. Might be of use to people who generate and serve a static version of their Ghost blog.

PUBLIC_URL.description: The HTTPS URL of this app: either your custom domain or default `herokuapp.com` hostname.
